TopicTitle: My PC will not load KSP, Non Steam

Articles.Content: So, I just got around to updating KSP from the website, as I do not have the game on steam. I have a few mods installed from CKAN (BD Armoury, KAS, KIS). The game is now stuck while loading squad/parts/aero/fairing/fairingsize1/fairingsize1. I have searched the game files for this file, and according to my PC, it doesn't exist. HELP ME!

Will it start without the mods installed?

Did you uninstall the old copy before installing the update one, install it to a different location, or just install overtop of the old on?
It won't start with or without mods, I normally install into a new KSP file, so that I have a variety of saves/back-ups
